mana.crystal.name: Mana Crystal
mana.description.tooltip:
You can use mana to activate more powerful version of card effects.

Mana is available in multiple forms:
- Mana <style="value">Essence</style> that is generated by effects from player cards and spells and <style="status">vanishes</style> at the End of the Turn.
- <style="value">Ambient</style> Mana that is provided by the Environment and can be used in a limited capacity and is <style="status">re-rolled</style> at the End of the Turn when used.
- Mana <style="value">Crystals</style> that have been picked up by the player throughout their journey or generated by crystalization effects that can remain in the Inventory across turns and rounds.
mana.description.crystals.tooltip:
You can use mana to activate more powerful version of card effects. You can <style="status">carry</style> up to <style="value">{0}</style> crystals of this color in your inventory.

Mana is available in multiple forms:
- Mana <style="value">Essence</style> that is generated by effects from player cards and spells and <style="status">vanishes</style> at the End of the Turn.
- <style="value">Ambient</style> Mana that is provided by the Environment and can be used in a limited capacity and is <style="status">re-rolled</style> at the End of the Turn when used.
- Mana <style="value">Crystals</style> that have been picked up by the player throughout their journey or generated by crystalization effects that can remain in the Inventory across turns and rounds.
